name: Remove Assignee User Level
description: Notifies an administrator to remove Source Configuration Assignee user level.
subject: $requesterUser has requested that you revoke the Source Configuration Assignee user level from $user
body:
Dear $adminUser,

$requesterUser has requested that the Source Configuration Assignee user level be removed from $user because they have finished onboarding their assigned sources.

To revoke this user level from $user, go to their identity and remove the Source Configuration Assignee user level.


Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
